name: Autocom Diagnostic Partner
goal:
Autocom provide customer with the knowledge and the tools they need to be able to understand and solve diagnostic problems with vehicles. With help from us the customer should feel confident that they have what it takes to do a great job.

Autocom has been in the business for over 20 years now, and now more then ever, we clearly see that our customers need access to the correct vehicle information in order to be successfull. We help you by collecting, structurizing and distributing vehicle information so that your work will be as effective and as profitable as possible.

Our organization is built around different developing divisions working with hardware, software and vehicle diagnostics. These divisions are working close together with our marketing department who in turn works close to our customers. Add to this the extensive knowledge about vehicle diagnostics that our corporate group possess and you will start to get a feeling of what we can achieve.
euInitiatives:
- Building the European Data Economy
- Regulation (EC) No 715/2007 on type approval of motor vehicles with respect to emissions from light passenger and commercial vehicles (Euro 5 and Euro 6)
